name: Brick House - Classic - Corona Larga
additionalNotes: Brick House Cigars are a flavorful handmade Nicaraguan puro created by third-generation cigar makers, Eric and Bobby Newman to recreate the vintage cigar brand their grandfather J.C. Newman launched in 1895 to honor his family heritage and his beloved childhood memories. The Brick House cigar wrapper is a hearty Havana Subido and the blend is made of specially aged Nicaraguan tobaccos.
